import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/providers/{provider_id}/orgs/{org_id}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the organization details like active status.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details

          required={false}
          schemaName={"OrgMembership (string)"}

          collapsible={false}
          name={"active"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"boolean"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If set to false, the organization will be deactivated and no new resources can be provisioned. Existing resources will be inaccessible."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
